moduleInfo.label: Module options
moduleInfo.comment: e-conomic module developed by Nybohansen ApS

api_url.label: API Url
api_url.comment: Please do not change, unless completely sure of the consequences!

apiToken.label: API token
apiToken.comment: Token used to connect to e-conomic

product_update_from_economic.label: Update from e-conomic
product_update_from_economic.comment: Determines if products in Magento should have their information updated with information from e-conomic, when products are updated in e-conomic

webhook_url.label: Webhook url
webhook_url.comment: Insert this into e-conomic under Webhooks

field_mapping_from_e_to_m.label: Mapping of e-conomic fields to Magento fields
field_mapping_from_e_to_m.comment: Determines the mapping between the fields in e-conomic and the attributes in Magento

inventory_location.label: The location id of the inventory to use when creating orderlines, and updating stock values from
inventory_location.comment: Only applicable if you use inventory location, otherwise leave it blank

product_creation.label: Create or update product in e-conomic when

product_deletion.label: Delete product from e-conomic when product is deleted in Magento
product_deletion.comment: Note: If an order/invoice in e-conomic contains the product, it cannot be deleted from e-conomic, and will therefore only be deleted in Magento

product_group_use_default.label: Use default product group
product_group_use_default.comment: If set to Yes, all created products will belong to a single product group in e-conomic. If set to No a magento product attribute can be used to determine the productgroup

default_product_group.label: Default product group
default_product_group.comment: All created products will belong to this prouct group in e-conomic

product_group_attribute.label: Magento attribute to use as product group
product_group_attribute.comment: All created products will belong to the product group (id) contained in the chosen attribute. Note: The attribute values must exist as product group ids in e-conomic

product_id_attribute.label: Attribute containing the product id
product_id_attribute.comment: Created products will have an e-conomic id equal to the value of the attribute. Note the values of the attribute must exist and be unique, the maximum length of the product id including prefix is 25 characters!

product_id_prefix.label: Prefix of product id
product_id_prefix.comment: Add prefix to all created products in e-conomic

product_mapping_from_m_e_heading.label: Product mapping configuration from Magento to e-conomic

field_mapping_from_m_to_e.label: Mapping of Magento fields to Economic fields
field_mapping_from_m_to_e.comment: Determines how fields in Magento are mapped to fields in e-conomic

product_unit_attribute.label: Choose attribute containing the product unit
product_unit_attribute.comment: Created products will have an e-conomic unit, equal to the value of the attribute

product_unit_create_if_not_exists.label: Create unit if it doesn't exists
product_unit_create_if_not_exists.comment: Create units specified in Magento which doesn't exists in e-conomic

debtor_create_new.label: Create new debtors in e-conomic
debtor_create_new.comment: If set to Yes, the module will create debtors in e-conomic if the debtor does not exists. If set to no, a default debtor must be chosen. If set to always, a debtor is always created regardless if a debtor with the same credentials exists

default_debtor_home.label: Default debtor (Home country)
default_debtor_home.comment: All orders belonging to the home country, will be placed on the debtor with this debtor-id in e-conomic

default_debtor_eu.label: Default debtor (EU country)
default_debtor_eu.comment: All orders belonging to a EU country, will be placed on the debtor with this debtor-id in e-conomic

default_debtor_abroad.label: Default debtor (Abroad)
default_debtor_abroad.comment: All orders not belonging to the home country or EU, will be placed on the debtor with this debtor id in e-conomic

debtor_mapping.label: Mapping of Magento's customer groups to e-conomic's debtor groups
debtor_mapping.comment: Determines how Magento's customer groups are mapped to e-conomic's debtor groups

debtor_identification_field.label: Identification field
debtor_identification_field.comment: Field to identify customers between e-conomic and Magento

compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_d.label: Compare the debtorgroup when searching for existing debtors in e-conomic
compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_d.comment: If this is set to yes and the identification field matches but the debtorgroup doesn't, a new debtor will be created in e-conomic

use_company_name_if_available.label: Use company name, instead of customer name if available?
use_company_name_if_available.comment: If company name is available, this will be used instead of customer name when creating debtors and creating orders

update_debtor_information.label: Update debtor information everytime a order is placed

vat_home_country.label: Choose VAT home country/countries
vat_home_country.comment: Choose the country/countries that refers to VAT home country in e-conomic. Countries chosen here, will override the countries under EU

vat_eu_countries.label: Choose VAT EU countries
vat_eu_countries.comment: Selected countries have VAT zone EU in e-conomic. All other countries (except the home country) will have a VAT zone in e-conomic that is identical to Abroad.

javascript.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">
                                            checkDebtorCreation = function() {
                                                //No
                                                if ($('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_create_new').getValue() == 0) {

                                                    //Show
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_home').up(1).show();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_eu').up(1).show();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_abroad').up(1).show();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_update_debtor_information').show();

                                                    //hide
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_identification_field').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_debtor').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('row_economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_mapping').hide();


                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_use_company_name_if_available').up(1).show();

                                                    if ($('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_create_new').getValue() == 1) {
                                                        $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_identification_field').up(1).show();
                                                        $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_debtor').up(1).show();
                                                    }
                                                }
                                                //Yes
                                                if ($('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_create_new').getValue() == 1) {
                                                    //Show
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_identification_field').up(1).show();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_debtor').up(1).show();
                                                    $('row_economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_mapping').show();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_update_debtor_information').show();

                                                    //hide
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_home').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_eu').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_abroad').up(1).hide();
                                                }

                                                //Always
                                                if ($('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_create_new').getValue() == 2) {
                                                    //Show
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_identification_field').up(1).show();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_debtor').up(1).show();
                                                    $('row_economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_mapping').show();

                                                    //Hide
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_identification_field').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_compare_debtorgroup_when_searching_for_debtor').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_home').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_eu').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_default_debtor_abroad').up(1).hide();
                                                    $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_update_debtor_information').hide();
                                                }

                                            }
                                            Event.observe(window, 'load', function() {
                                                Event.observe('economic2_options_debtorConfig_debtor_create_new', 'change', checkDebtorCreation);
                                                $('economic2_options_debtorConfig_javascript').up(1).hide();
                                                checkDebtorCreation();
                                            })
                                        </script>

create_order_status.label: Create order in e-conomic when status is
create_order_status.comment: If nothing is selected, no order will be created in e-conomic

create_invoice_status.label: Create invoice in e-conomic when status is
create_invoice_status.comment: If nothing is selected, no invoice will be created in e-conomic

delete_order_status.label: Delete order in e-conomic when status is
delete_order_status.comment: If nothing is selected, no orders will be deleted in e-conomic

sync_credit_memo.label: Synchronize credit memos?
sync_credit_memo.comment: Credit memos will be synchronized to e-conomic

sync_credit_as_invoice.label: Create credit memos as invoices?
sync_credit_as_invoice.comment: All synchronized credit memos will be synchronized as invoices to e-conomic

force_book.label: Force creation of invoice, even if integrity fails
force_book.comment: It is not recommended to set this to true. This could cause the booking of invoices that are not correct

book_invoice.label: Automatically book the invoice?
book_invoice.comment: The created invoice will be booked automatically after creation

use_magento_invoice_number.label: Book invoices and credit memos with Magento invoice number?
use_magento_invoice_number.comment: This requires the the invoice number is free and available in e-conomic. It also requires that a invoice number is available in Magento (It is possible to synchronize invoices to e-conomic, without actually creating an invoice in Magento)

store_order_number_in_economic.label: Save the order number from Magento in e-conomic

store_order_number_in.label: Store the Magento order number in the e-conomic field

order_number_prefix.label: Text to place in front of order number

add_comment_when_synced.label: Add comment to the Magento order when the order is synced to e-conomic?
add_comment_when_synced.comment: If set to Yes, comments will be added to the Magento order, when a sync has been performed

use_base_currency.label: Transfer orders using base currency
use_base_currency.comment: This is only applicable if the store uses multiple currencies

use_departments.label: Use departments
use_departments.comment: To use this feature you must be authorized to use the Dimension add-on module in e-conomic.

default_department.label: Default department to place order
default_department.comment: All created orders will be placed in this department. Requires the dimension module to be activated in e-conomic.

default_shipping_item.label: e-conomic item id to use for default shipping

shipping_item_mapping.label: Mapping of e-conomic items to magento shipping types

javascript_shipping.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">
                                            economic2ShippingToggle = function() {
                                                if ($('economic2_options_shipping_item_config_use_default_shipping_item').getValue() == 0) {
                                                    //Show
                                                    $('row_economic2_options_shipping_item_config_shipping_item_mapping').show();
                                                }else{
                                                    //hide
                                                    $('row_economic2_options_shipping_item_config_shipping_item_mapping').hide();
                                                }

                                            }
                                            Event.observe(window, 'load', function() {
                                                Event.observe('economic2_options_shipping_item_config_use_default_shipping_item', 'change', economic2ShippingToggle);
                                                $('economic2_options_shipping_item_config_javascript_shipping').up(1).hide();
                                                economic2ShippingToggle();
                                            })
                                        </script>

use_row_discount.label: Add discounts to the individual rows
use_row_discount.comment: Set this to yes, if your products belongs to different tax rates

discount_item.label: e-conomic item id to use for order discount

reward_points_item.label: e-conomic item id to use for reward points
reward_points_item.comment: Currently this function only works with the reward points module from Magestore

reward_points_text.label: Reward points text
reward_points_text.comment: Text to use on orders and invoice regarding reward points

reward_points_tax_rate.label: Reward points tax rate
reward_points_tax_rate.comment: Tax rate should be entered as e.g. 25 for 25% tax rate

credit_memo_adjustment_item.label: e-conomic item id to use for credit memo adjustment
credit_memo_adjustment_item.comment: Please note, this item cannot have tax applied in e-conomic

credit_memo_adjustment_text.label: Text to use when credit memo adjustment is used

payment_fee_item.label: e-conomic item id to use for payment fee
payment_fee_item.comment: e-conomic item used for payment fee. (This function is only implemented for certain external extensions)

payment_fee_label.label: Payment fee label
payment_fee_label.comment: The label used for the payment fee in e-conomic

terms_of_payment.label: Mapping of e-conomic terms of payment to magento payment types

integrity_check_notify.label: Send e-mail if integrity check fails?
integrity_check_notify.comment: The order integrity is checked by comparing the net and gross totals of the order in Magento with the net and gross totals e-conomic

integrity_report_email.label: E-mail address to send the integrity report
integrity_report_email.comment: A report will only be sent in the case where the integrity check fails
